name: iMagine
body:
iMagine is a fan game inspired by [Magi Nation](http://magination.wikia.com/wiki/Magi-Nation_(TV_Series)), a Canadian anime broadcast in 2007 and 2010.  The show involves the Final Dreamers Tony, Strag, and Edyn facing off against Agram and his Shadow Magi in a quest to gain all of the Dreamstones in order to lock Agram in his domain, called the Core, forever.

[Latest Version](https://iggyvolz.github.com/iMagine/head.html) (Warning - may be buggy and/or undocumented)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
